customer_reviews.title: Same problem!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this faucet installed in February 2017. Like another review on Amazon the hot water valve was not as strong (pressure) as the Cold Water Valve, Last week it stopped working completely. After calling a plumber, he checked the hot water line to the tub and everything was fine. He had no idea what the problem was. The problem was the faucet. After reinstalling the faucet the pressure was just slightly better. This morning dead, with water just a trickle, again. This is turning into an expensive situation. Another type of faucet to be ordered. Another plumber appointment to install a new faucet. (Parts for this faucet apparently are unavailable after some research) Buyer beware. .
customer_reviews.author: Madeo

customer_reviews.title: It shouldn't be this hard to connect to water supply lines!
customer_reviews.text: We cannot find a proper connection for this faucet. We have been to hardware store after hardware store, had tons of advice, and tried everything to connect this fixture to our water supply lines but can't get them to seal properly. It's a great fixture but we need help. It shouldn't be this hard. :( ***UPDATE: After going to four stores and thankfully, a plumbing store, I was referred to a local hardware store that the plumbing store had heard had clawfoot tub supplies. They had the proper connections!!! Geez, that was a long time coming!!!
customer_reviews.author: TrappedinMI

customer_reviews.title: Old fashioned quality, with modern ease.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged. The faucet is high quality and beautiful. The faucet is much heavier then the most faucets out there. Installation was a breeze. The faucet enhances the look of our antique claw tub and we could not be more pleased. Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.author: donna radlowski

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful faucet. Works well and was the perfect choice for my bathroom. I do wish that you could rotate the handles so that the labels could always show how you want.My cold and hot water valves are on opposite sides than the norm so the labels are turned around. We were able to make some other adjustments to remedy that a little (adjusted the on/off positioning) but turning the labels around would have been ideal. The faucet is smooth and easy to turn on and it opens full with a quarter turn - just great!
customer_reviews.author: C.A. Bright

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy your cold shower...
customer_reviews.text: Upon having a plumber install this, the hot water valve barely released any water. We checked the floor valve, water pressure to the tub, line etc and they were all fine. We had a second plumber look at it and he too said the unit is defective. A little to spendy of a product to have it not work.
